corp_memo_001.title: Project Neurovector Status
corp_memo_001.content:
TO: All Department Heads
FROM: Dr. Sarah Chen, R&D

Project Neurovector has entered Phase 3 testing. Initial trials show promising results for civilian crowd control applications. However, we're seeing unexpected side effects in prolonged exposure scenarios.

Recommend proceeding with caution. The board wants results, but we can't afford another incident like the Tokyo facility.

- Dr. Chen

personal_log_002.title: Marcus - Day 14
personal_log_002.content:
They think I don't know what they're doing in Sub-Level 3. The screaming stopped two days ago. That's not a good sign.

Found Sarah's research notes in the trash. The neural interface isn't just for crowd control - they're trying to create permanent compliance. Turn people into puppets.

I need to get this information out. If they catch me...

news_report_003.title: Underground Violence Escalates
news_report_003.content:
Neo-Tokyo News Network - Reports of coordinated attacks on corporate facilities continue to rise. Authorities suspect the involvement of the shadowy organization known only as 'The Resistance.'

Corporate Security Chief Williams stated: 'These terrorists threaten the stability that our citizens depend on. We will not negotiate with extremists.'

Meanwhile, civilian casualties from police response continue to mount...

tech_doc_004.title: Neurovector Technical Manual v2.3
tech_doc_004.content:
CLASSIFIED - LEVEL 4 CLEARANCE REQUIRED

Neurovector Field Deployment Guidelines:

1. Effective range: 200m radius
2. Target limit: 3 subjects maximum
3. Duration: 5-8 minutes before neural fatigue
4. Side effects: Temporary memory loss, disorientation

WARNING: Do not exceed recommended exposure times. Permanent neural damage may occur.

For technical support, contact Dr. Chen at extension 4471.

conversation_005.title: Overheard: Lab Technicians
conversation_005.content:
Audio Log - Security Camera 7B

Tech 1: "Did you see the test results from yesterday?"
Tech 2: "The ones they told us to delete? Yeah, I saw them."
Tech 1: "Twenty percent permanent neural damage. TWENTY PERCENT!"
Tech 2: "Keep your voice down. They're shipping it to field teams next week anyway."
Tech 1: "Those poor bastards don't know what they're signing up for..."

[End of recording]

research_006.title: Neural Interface Research - Phase 3
research_006.content:
Research Log 47-C

Subject compliance rates have improved to 87% with the new neural interface design. However, we're observing concerning patterns:

- 15% of subjects show permanent behavioral changes
- 8% develop aggressive tendencies toward corporate personnel
- 3% exhibit complete neural shutdown

Dr. Martinez has requested we halt testing, but the board insists we meet the Q4 deadline. Beginning Phase 4 testing on unwilling subjects tomorrow.

- Dr. Sarah Chen, Lead Researcher

history_007.title: The Tokyo Incident - Classified Report
history_007.content:
EYES ONLY - BOARD MEMBERS

Incident Report: Tokyo Research Facility
Date: March 15, 2087

At 14:30, a catastrophic failure occurred during Neurovector testing. Subject 47 broke free from neural control and activated the facility's security systems against personnel.

Casualties: 23 dead, 67 injured
Cover Story: Industrial accident, gas leak explosion
Status: Facility destroyed, all evidence eliminated

Recommendation: Suspend all Neurovector research pending safety review.
Board Decision: Research to continue at Neo-Tokyo facility with enhanced security protocols.

mission_008.title: Operation Mindbreak - Mission Brief
mission_008.content:
CONFIDENTIAL MISSION BRIEFING

Operation: MINDBREAK
Objective: Infiltrate Syntech Research Facility
Primary Target: Dr. Sarah Chen
Secondary Target: Neurovector research data

INTEL: Dr. Chen has been feeding information to resistance cells. She knows too much about the project's true purpose. Extraction or elimination authorized.

WARNING: Facility is equipped with automated defense systems. Neurovector-enhanced security personnel on site. Approach with extreme caution.

Extraction point: Roof, 0300 hours.

corp_memo_009.title: Budget Allocation - Security Division
corp_memo_009.content:
Internal Memo - Finance Department

Security budget has been increased by 300% following recent 'incidents.' New allocations:

- Automated turret systems: $2.4M
- Neural compliance officers: $1.8M
- Facility hardening: $3.2M
- 'Accident' cleanup fund: $5.0M

Note: All receipts for cleanup operations to be filed under 'Facility Maintenance' to avoid board scrutiny.

Reminder: Quarterly neural compliance testing is mandatory for all personnel.

personal_log_010.title: Sarah's Final Entry
personal_log_010.content:
Personal Log - Dr. Sarah Chen

They know. Security came by my lab today asking questions. I've hidden the real research data, but it's only a matter of time.

If you're reading this, I'm probably dead. The Neurovector project isn't what they told us. It's not crowd control - it's mass enslavement. They want to turn every citizen into a compliant worker drone.

The resistance was right. We have to stop this before it's too late.

The real data is hidden in terminal subnet 7-Alpha. Password: FREEDOM47

Tell my daughter I'm sorry.

- Sarah

security_log_011.title: Security Breach - Level 7
security_log_011.content:
SECURITY ALERT LOG
Timestamp: 23:47:12
Location: Research Level 7

Unauthorized access detected in Neurovector storage vault. Subject attempted to download classified files before triggering security lockdown.

Subject Identity: Dr. Sarah Chen (Employee ID: 4471)
Action Taken: Subject terminated by automated defense systems
Status: Data breach contained, all files secured

Note: Cover story prepared - 'Laboratory accident during late-night research.' Family has been notified.

Security Chief Williams recommends increasing surveillance on all Level 4+ personnel.

email_012.title: RE: Unusual Power Grid Activity
email_012.content:
From: maintenance@syntech.corp
To: security@syntech.corp
Subject: RE: Unusual Power Grid Activity

Security Team,

We've detected multiple unauthorized access attempts on our power grid control systems. Someone's been probing our infrastructure - specifically targeting street lighting and traffic control networks.

Recommend immediate security audit of all hackable systems. If they can cut power to a district, they could disable our entire security network.

Full system diagnostic attached. Note the pattern in access attempts - this isn't random. Someone knows exactly what they're looking for.

- Chief Engineer Rodriguez

P.S. The backup generators won't help if they hack the distribution network itself.

resistance_note_013.title: Resistance Cell - Operation Notes
resistance_note_013.content:
ENCRYPTED MESSAGE - CELL 7

Comrades,

Intel confirms our worst fears. Project Neurovector isn't just mind control - it's permanent neural restructuring. They're not just controlling people, they're rewriting their personalities.

Sarah Chen tried to warn us before they killed her. Her research data contains the antidote formulas. We need to retrieve it before they move the facility.

New recruits: Learn to hack infrastructure. Power grids, traffic systems, security cameras - turn their own technology against them. Every light you kill is one less camera watching us.

Remember: We're not terrorists. We're the last free minds fighting for humanity's future.

Stay vigilant. Trust no one.

- Commander Phoenix

experiment_log_014.title: Test Subject 47 - Final Report
experiment_log_014.content:
CLASSIFIED EXPERIMENT LOG
Subject: 47 (Former Resistance Operative)
Date: March 14, 2087
Researcher: Dr. S. Chen

Day 30 of neural interface testing. Subject 47 has shown remarkable resistance to standard conditioning protocols. Unlike previous subjects, cognitive function remains largely intact despite 72 hours of continuous exposure.

Concerning development: Subject appears to be learning to manipulate the neural interface. Several security systems activated without authorization during testing. Recommend immediate termination of experiment.

UPDATE: Dr. Martinez overruled termination order. Board demands results before quarterly review.

UPDATE 2: Subject has somehow accessed facility network. All security personnel to Level 3 immediately. This is not a drill.

[LOG TERMINATED - SYSTEM LOCKDOWN INITIATED]

news_report_015.title: Rolling Blackouts Plague Neo-Tokyo
news_report_015.content:
Neo-Tokyo Evening News - Breaking Report

The city experienced its third major power outage this month as unknown hackers continue to target critical infrastructure. Traffic lights failed across twelve districts, causing massive delays during evening rush hour.

"This coordinated attack on our power grid is clearly the work of domestic terrorists," stated Mayor Harrison. "We will not be held hostage by these extremists."

Syntech Corporation, which manages much of the city's automated systems, declined to comment on security vulnerabilities. However, sources indicate that hackers are specifically targeting interconnected systems - bringing down power stations to disable entire networks of cameras, doors, and defensive systems.

Citizens are advised to avoid the affected districts until power is restored.

This is the largest infrastructure attack since the Tokyo facility incident five years ago.
